{
    "number": 6697,
    "id": "M1001",
    "data": "1,2,4,6,9,13,17,22,28,35,43,51,60,70,81,93,106,120,135,151,167,184,202,221,241,262,284,307,331,356,382,409,437,466,496,527,559,591,624,658,693,729,766,804,843,883,924,966,1009,1053,1098,1144,1191,1239",
    "name": "Number of subwords of length n in infinite word generated by a -> aab, b -> b.",
    "reference": [
        "N. J. A. Sloane and Simon Plouffe, The Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences, Academic Press, 1995 (includes this sequence)."
    ],
    "link": [
        "Vincenzo Librandi, <a href=\"/A006697/b006697.txt\">Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..1000</a>",
        "J.-P. Allouche and J. Shallit, <a href=\"http://dx.doi.org/10.1016/0304-3975(92)90001-V\">The ring of k-regular sequences</a>, Theoretical Computer Sci., 98 (1992), 163-197.",
        "J.-P. Allouche, J. Shallit, <a href=\"http://arxiv.org/abs/1605.02361\">On the subword complexity of the fixed point of a -> aab, b -> b, and generalizations</a>, arXiv preprint arXiv:1605.02361 [math.CO], 2016."
    ],
    "formula": [
        "G.f.: 1 + 1/(1-x) + 1/(1-x)^2 * [1/(1-x) - sum(k>=1, x^(2^k+k-1))] (conjectured). - _Ralf Stephan_, Mar 05 2004",
        "Conjectures: partial sums of A103354, also equal to A094913(n) + 1. - _Vladeta Jovovic_, Sep 19 2005",
        "a(n) = sum(k=0,n,min(2^k,n-k+1)) = 2^(m+1)-1 + (n-m)(n-m+1)/2 with m = [ n+1-LambertW( 2^(n+1) * log(2) ) / log(2) ] = integer part of the solution to 2^m = n+1-m. (conjectured). - _M. F. Hasler_, Dec 14 2007"
    ],
    "mathematica": [
        "A103354[n_] := Floor[ FullSimplify[ ProductLog[ 2^n*Log[2]]/Log[2]]]; Accumulate[ Table[ A103354[n], {n, 1, 54}]] (* _Jean-Fran\u00e7ois Alcover_, Dec 13 2011, after _M. F. Hasler_ *)"
    ],
    "program": [
        "(PARI) LambertW(y) = solve( X=1,log(y), X*exp(X)-y) A006697(n,b=2)=local(m=floor(n+1-LambertW(b^(n+1)*log(b))/log(b)));(b^(m+1)-1)/(b-1)+(n-m)*(n-m+1)/2 \\\\ _M. F. Hasler_, Dec 14 2007"
    ],
    "xref": [
        "Cf. A005943, A005942, A094913, A134457, A134466."
    ],
    "keyword": "nonn,easy,nice",
    "offset": "0,2",
    "author": "_N. J. A. Sloane_, _Jeffrey Shallit_",
    "ext": [
        "More terms from Michel ten Voorde (seqfan(AT)tenvoorde.org) Apr 11 2001"
    ],
    "references": 7,
    "revision": 33,
    "time": "2017-10-07T00:13:36-04:00",
    "created": "1991-07-11T03:00:00-04:00"
}
